---
title: "About This Website"
---

This website summarize the progress of registered laboratories of PSA 002 project: [OBJECT ORIENTATION](https://psysciacc.org/002-object-orientation/). The proposing author and the assistants are updating this site routinely during data collection. 

This website is generaged by `rmarkdown` package. You will find the example in [R Markdown: The Definitive Guide](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/rmarkdown-site.html) written by Yihui Xie, J. J. Allaire, and Garrett Grolemund.
